name: Mirrors of the Past
description:
Discover the truth about your true reflection, in a mansion where nothing is as it seems. Will the shadows of the past haunt the future? Can you find peace while you live in chaos? The truth is hidden in the mirrors of the past. 

Game created during Global Game Jam 2022 - local jam hub KrakJam.

Move: WSAD 

Next dialogue: E 

Credits: 

Art Design - Aleksandra Wilk (Pajonk), Elwira Kowalska (Miraine)

Programming - Tomasz Czuma (Chomash), Michał Górecki (Enzer)

Animations - Michał Górecki (Enzer)

Scritp - Izabela Górecka (Bellazi)

Ideas - all
